title: If I sneeze in prayer (tashahhud) & say Alhamdulillah, do I continue or repeat what I was reciting?
transcript: says I know that we need to say alhamdulillah after sneezing even within prayer suppose I am reciting to shahudan in the middle of it I sneezed in this case I say alhamdulillah and either I continue from where I was reciting before sneezing or I can start over the shahud what is the ruling please advise the answer is alhamdulillah when you are reciting your tashahud or salutation upon the prophet is Assam and you happen to sneeze just say alhamdulillah and continue without the need to go all over from the beginning and repeat that just move on and continue after saying alhamdulillah
